archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Overdue Party Bill/Invoice
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify a party bill/invoice that is overdue for payment and manage its resolution.

properties.value: Manage Overdue Party Bill/Invoice identifies a party bill/invoice that is overdue for payment. It initiates party debt recovery activity in accordance with appropriate commercial practice and policies as well as initiating and managing follow-up with a party that has one or more overdue amounts. When applicable it arranges and monitors a payment plan to allow a party to pay one or more overdue amounts in installments.
